text.originalText: A CATAPULT EJECTS YOU FROM THE TOWER!
INSIDE A STEEL CAGE,A FAIR MAIDEN WEEPS.
text.localizedText: В стальной клетке связанная красивая девушка.

text.originalText: A PASSAGE LEADS OUTSIDE, TAKE IT (Y/N)?
ETCHED IN SILVER, MESSAGE E READS: OEI/:1-33-1EK5;D-ET,
text.localizedText: На серебряной табличке E гравировка: лиасA-,E1,;мД54а,олр,

text.originalText: "YOU'VE DISCOVERED MY TRUE IDENTITY! INTO THE SOUL MAZE YOU GO..."
text.localizedText: "Вы раскрыли мою истинную сущность! В лабиринт души..."

text.originalText: "MY SAVIORS, YOU'RE ALWAYS WELCOME HERE!YOU SHOULD FIND THE INNER SANCTUM... LIVE LONG AND PROSPER."
text.localizedText: "Мои спасители, вам тут всегда рады! Вы должны найти внутреннее святилище... Живите долго и процветайте."

text.originalText: "VARNLINGS, I QUEST THEE TO FIND THE CRYPT OF CARMENCA. AWAY WITH YOU..."
text.localizedText: "Жители VARN, я поручаю вам найти склеп Карменка. Ушли..."

text.originalText: KINGS GUARDS APPROACH. "NO KING'S PASS, NO ADMITTANCE!"
text.localizedText: Вас окружила королевская стража. "Без королевского пропуска нельзя!"

text.originalText: CASTLE GUARDS EXCLAIM, "NO MERCHANTS PASS! BEGONE PEASANTS."
text.localizedText: Охранник говорит, "Покажите пропуск торговца или уходите."

text.originalText: A LOUD SCREAM FROM BEHIND THE DOOR!
A SIGN ABOVE THE DOOR READS:
STANDING BEHIND A LARGE DESK, A TALL BEARDED HALF-ORC GRUNTS, "IF YOU DON'T SIGN IN, YOU CAN'T STAY! WELL (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: Стоящий за стойкой, высокий бородатый полуорк ворчит: "Вы хотите войти и остановиться тут (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: A MAN ENCLOSED IN A STEEL CAGE SAYS, "CAN I HELP YOU FIND ANYTHING (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: Человек за стальной решеткой спрашивает:"Я могу вам помочь (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: A PUTRID SMELL PERVADES THE ROOM... LOOK FOR SOME FOOD (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: Запах гнили наполняет комнату... Ищете еду (Y/N)?

text.originalText: AN ANCIENT LOOKING CLERIC STAGGERS UP TOTHE PARTY GASPING, "I CAN HELP, REALLY I CAN!" ACCEPT THE OFFER (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: К группе пошатываясь и тяжело дыша подошел очень старый клерик. "Я могу вампомочь, серьезно!" Согласиться (Y/N)?

text.originalText: SEVERAL ADVENTURERS ARMORED IN DRAGON SCALES, ADDRESS THE PARTY, "LOOKING FOR TRAINING (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: Несколько человек в броне из чешуи дракона обращаются к группе: "Хотите потренироваться (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: "I AM ZOM, ASTRAL BROTHER OF ZAM.
MORANGO THE MYSTIC ASKS, "WHO SHALL I MEASURE (1-6)?"
MAGIC FIRE COLD ELEC ACID FEAR POISON SLEEP
text.localizedText: магии огню холоду электр кислот страх яду сну

text.originalText: CARVED ON A BLOCK OF ICE ARE THE WORDS: START AT 15-7 AND WALK TO DOOM!
text.localizedText: На ледяном блоке нацарапано: Начинай с 15-7 и иди к року!

text.originalText: A SECRET PASSAGE TO DOOM, TAKE IT (Y/N)?
THE POOL OF HEALTH GRANTS THOSE WHO ARE WORTHY +4 ENDURANCE!
text.localizedText: Озеро здоровья. Тот, кто достоин, получает +4 Выносливости!

text.originalText: YOU'VE BEEN SURROUNDED BY THE DARK RIDERAND HIS MEN! HE CHALLENGES YOU TO A DUEL...ACCEPT (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: Вы окружены группой людей во главе с Черным всадником! Он вызывает вас на дуэль... Принять (Y/N)?

text.originalText: THE FABELED CASTLE DOOM! WILL YOU ENTER (Y/N)?
LAVA FILLS THE VALLEY OF FIRE!
THE DRAGONS BODY DISAPPEARS, EXCEPT FOR A SHINY TOOTH!
text.localizedText: Тело дракона исчезло. Вы находите блестящий зуб!

text.originalText: I AM PERCELLA THE DRUID AND I HAVE WHAT YOU NEED. BUT PROMISE ME THAT YOU WON'T HELP THAT DEMONIC MENACE. ACCEPT (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: Я Перселла, друид, и у меня есть то, чтовам нужно. Пообещайте не помогать демонической угрозе. Согласны (Y/N)?

text.originalText: THE WATER ERUPTS VIOLENTLY, REVEALING A TREMENDOUS SERPENT
EMBEDDED IN THE SIDE OF THE MOUNTAIN IS A LARGE WHEEL COVERED IN STRANGE AND ARCHAIC SYMBOLS. SPIN THE WHEEL (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: К скале прикреплено большое колесо, покрытое странными архаичными символами.Раскрутить колесо (Y/N)?

text.originalText: 1) RED THORAC 2) BLUE OGRAM 3) GREEN BAGAR 4) YELLOW LIMRA 5) PURPLE SAGRAN 6) ORANGE OOLAK 7) BLACK DRESIDION 8) WHITE DILITHIUM
text.localizedText: 1) красный торак 2) синий ограм 3) зеленый багар 4) желтая лимра 5) пурпурный сагран 6) оранжевый улак 7) черный дресидион 8) белый дилитиум

text.originalText: A WOODEN BRIDGE EXTENDES ACROSS THE OCEAN INTO THE MIST. A HOODED FIGURE MATERIALIZES, "TO CROSS YOU MUST EACH ANSWER A QUESTION, ACCEPT (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: Деревянный мост уходит через океан в туман. Фигура в капюшоне говорит: "Чтобыпройти, ответь на вопрос. Согласен (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: ATOP THIS PEAK 5 ISLANDS CAN BE SEEN TO THE SOUTHEAST
text.localizedText: С вершины горы видно пять островов на юго-востоке

text.originalText: A TIDAL WAVE SWEEPS THE PARTY AWAY!
CAVERNOUS PASSAGE TO ERLIQUIN, TAKE IT (Y/N)?
ANCIENT RUINS OF A DESERTED WIZARDS LAIRSHOW SIGNS OF RECENT USE, ENTER (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: Древние развалины убежища пустынного колдуна. Вокруг следы недавнего использования. Войти (Y/N)?

text.originalText: CONGRATULATIONS DISTINGUISHED TRAVELERS! THE GATES ARE NOW OPEN TO YOU, IN ORDER TO PASS THROUGH YOU MUST FIRST FIND MIGHT AND MAGIC BOOK TWO !!!
text.localizedText: Здравствуйте, прославленные путешественники! Врата открыты для вас. Чтобы пройти вам надо найти вторую часть MIGHT AND MAGIC!!!

text.originalText: A SIGN POINTING S. READS: BLACKRIDGE N.
A SIGN POINTING E. READS: BLACKRIDGE S.
A SIGN POINTING E. READS: ERLIQUIN
WRONG, YOU'RE TOO YOUNG TO UNDERSTAND.
CARVED ON A TREE: "9-9 RAVEN'S LAIR"
A DESCENDING STAIRCASE IS THE ENTRANCE TO A WARRIORS STRONGHOLD, GO IN (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: Лестница вниз, ведущая в оплот воителей.Войти (Y/N)?

text.originalText:
ON A THRONE ADORNED WITH PRECIOUS GEMS THE ICE PRINCESS SPEAKS, "CONQUEROR OF WORLDS, MAKER OF DREAMS THE GREATEST FORCE OF ALL, YET ELUSIVE IT SEEMS."
ANSWER:> ..........
text.localizedText:
На троне, украшенном драгоценными камнями, восседает ледяная принцесса. Она говорит: "Она покоряет миры, рождаетмечты, Она самая величайшая сила, хотя икажется иллюзорной."
Ответ: > ..........

text.originalText: YOUR RUBY WHISTLE BEGINS TO GLOW, BLOW IT (0-9 TIMES)?
AN ANCIENT TEMPLE CONVERTED TO A STRONGHOLD HAS NO APPARENT ENTRANCE.
text.localizedText: Древний храм, переделанный в крепость. Входа нигде не видно.

text.originalText:
ATOP THIS PEAK LOOKING:
N= A CAVE BEYOND WHITE WOLF. E= LARGE BEASTS ABOVE WYVERN PEAKS! S= DISTANT UNCHARTED ISLES. W= A PIRATE SHIP BEYOND KORIN BLUFFS.
text.localizedText:
Вы осматриваетесь с вершины горы.
С= Пещера за Белым волком. В= Чудовища над горами Виверн! Ю= Вдали неизведанные острова. З= Пиратский корабль за Утесом газели.

text.originalText: A SIGN POINTING N. READS: WHITE WOLF
A SIGN POINTING S. READS: PORTSMITH
A FOUNTAIN SPEAKS: "WILL THE PARTY DRINK (Y/N)?"
YOU FOUND A CHEST UPON WHICH AN INSCRIPTION READS: PROPERTY OF XX!XX! INSIDE YOU FOUND A RUBY WHISTLE, 2000 GOLD AND A NOTE: THE STRONGHOLD LIES AT B-3,14-2 BLOW TWICE TO ENTER.
text.localizedText: Вы нашли сундук. На нем надпись: Собственность XX!XX! Внутри вы нашли рубиновый свисток, 2000 золота и записку: крепость B-3,14-2, свистни два раза, чтобы войти.

text.originalText: A CAVERNOUS PASSAGE LEADS TO SORPIGAL, TAKE IT (Y/N)?
A GLOWING WHITE COLUMN, TOUCH IT (Y/N)?
A TOOTHLESS GYPSY SEER ASKS,"WHO WOULD LIKE TO HEAR THEIR SIGN (1-6)?"
text.localizedText: Беззубый цыган-провидец спрашивает: "Ктохочет узнать свой знак (1-6)?"

text.originalText: ONE OF THE WYVERN'S EYES BEGINS TO GLOW!TAKE IT (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: Один из глаз Виверна мерцает! Взять (Y/N)?

text.originalText: THE EXILED LORD KILBURN SPEAKS: "TAKE THIS MAP AND EXPLORE THE DESERT. REPORT YOUR FINDINGS TO THE OTHER LORDS.THEN THEY WILL UNDERSTAND!" ACCEPT(Y/N)?
text.localizedText: Лорд Килбурн-изгнанник говорит: "Бери эту карту и разведай пустыню. Расскажи освоих находках остальным лордам. Тогда они поймут!" Согласен (Y/N)?

text.originalText: PAINTED IN A BLACK AND WHITE PATTERN, A SIGN READS: THE FIRST PART IS FEMALE.
text.localizedText: Табличка в черно-белую клетку: Первая часть - женщина.

text.originalText: A LARGE SLAB OF CORAL BLOCKS A PASSAGE!
YOUR CORAL KEY FITS PERFECTLY IN THE LOCK, ENTER (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: Ваш коралловый ключ подошел к замку. Войти (Y/N)?

text.originalText: AT THE WATERS EDGE ARE THE DECAYING REMAINS OF A LARGE SHIP. SEARCH(Y/N)?
text.localizedText: На берегу гниющий остов большого корабляОбыскать (Y/N)?

text.originalText: A SMALL TRIBE OF DESERT NOMADS HAVE ESTABLISHED A TRADING POST HERE. TRADE ITEM (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: Небольшое племя песчаных кочевников поставило тут торговый пост. Торговать (Y/N)?

text.originalText: YOUR LEADER HAS NOTHING TO TRADE!
text.localizedText: У лидера нет ничего на обмен!

text.originalText: A WHIRLWIND SWOOPS THE PARTY AWAY!
A VIOLENT SANDSTORM BLASTS THE PARTY!
THE POOL OF WISDOM GRANTS THOSE WHO ARE WORTHY +4 PERSONALITY.
text.localizedText: Озеро мудрости. Тот, кто достоин, получает +4 Силы духа!

text.originalText: WE ARE THE CLERICS OF THE
THE CLERICS OF THE S. SHALL DEEM YOU WORTHY, IF YOU CAN FIND THEM!
text.localizedText: Клерики ю. посчитают вас достойными, если вы их найдете!

text.originalText: I AM ARENKO GUIRE AND THIS IS MY GROVE. CLIMB ALL THE TREES, WITHOUT LEAVING THE AREA, AND RETURN.
text.localizedText: Я Аренко Гайр и это моя роща. Залезьте на все деревья, не уходя, и возвращайтесь.

text.originalText: WELL DONE! WHAT IS YOUR PLEASURE? A) GOLD B) GEMS C) ITEM
text.localizedText: Отлично! Чего вы хотите? A) золото B) камни C) вещи

text.originalText: PAUL PEAD AND HIS MEN ATTACK!
text.localizedText: Пол Пэд и его люди нападают!

text.originalText: A HUGE WINGED BEAST EXCLAIMS, "THIS SWAMP IS QUITE DANGEROUS. FLY YOU TO SAFETY (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: Огромное крылатое чудище восклицает: "Это болото опасно. Перенести вас в безопасное место (Y/N)?"

text.originalText:
PAINTED ON THESE GROUNDS IS A BLACK & WHITE CHECKERED MOTIF COVERED WITH IDOLS SIMILAR TO THE ONES YOU CARRY. A LARGE BEING APPROACHES... OG SPEAKS, "QUEEN TO QUEENS LEVEL 3"
RESPONSE:
text.localizedText:
На земле нарисован узор из черных и белых клеток. На нем стоят идолы, подобные вашим. К вам идет большое существо... Ог говорит: "Королева на линию королевы 3"
Ответ:

text.originalText:
YOU HAVE RESTORED MY SIGHT! (+25000 EXP)I SEE AN IMPORTANT PRISONER IN A CASTLE ON MT. DOOM! HE HAS YOUR SIGHT.
OG CURSES AS THE IDOLS VANISH!
text.localizedText:
Вы восстановили мое зрение! (+25000 EXP)Я вижу важного пленника в замке на горе Рок! Ваши глаза у него.
Ог ругнулся когда идолы исчезли!

text.originalText: A WHIRLWIND SWOOPS THE PARTY AWAY!
A VIOLENT SANDSTORM BLASTS THE PARTY!
AT THE CENTER OF THE LAND THAT TIME FORGOT STANDS AN HOURGLASS,TURN IT(Y/N)?
text.localizedText: В центре земли, забытой временем, стоят песочные часы. Повернуть их (Y/N)?

text.originalText: YOUR ACTIONS REFLECT YOUR VIEWS OF 6 +
text.localizedText: Ваши дела и характер. Рейтинг: из 6 +

text.originalText: STATUE OF A GIANT HOLDING THE SCALE OF JUDGEMENT. WHO WILL CLIMB ON (1-6)?
text.localizedText: Статуя гиганта держит чашу весов правосудия. Кто встанет на нее (1-6)?

text.originalText: STRANGE ALIEN DEVICE GRANTS THOSE WHO ARE WORTHY +4 INTELLECT!
text.localizedText: Странная машина пришельцев. Тот, кто достоин, +4 Интеллект!

text.originalText: SCATTERED REMAINS OF A METALLIC CRAFT! AN ALIEN GRUNTS, "EEP OP OOP!" REACTION: A)HOSTILE B)NEUTRAL C)FRIENDLY
text.localizedText: Обломки летательного аппарата! Пришелец бормочет: "Йип оп уоп!" Вы реагируете: A)Враждебно B)нейтрально C)Дружественно

text.originalText: "VARNLINGS TAKE HEED! OUR PRISONER HAS ESCAPED AND MAY BE DISGUISED AS A NOBLE.FIND HIS COUNTERPART TO EXPOSE HIM!"
text.localizedText: "Жители VARN, осторожно! Наш пленник бежал и может подменить собой знатную особу. Найдите, кого он подменил!"

text.originalText: STATUE OF A LION GROWLS,"PASSWORD?" RESPONSE:> ..........
IS THE PASSWORD FOR TODAY, LEAVE THE AREA AND CHANGE IT I MAY!"
text.localizedText: пароль на сегодня. Уйдешь далеко и его сменю я!"

text.originalText: THE FABLED BUILDING OF GOLD, ENTER (Y/N)?
HALF BURIED CORPSE ASKS FOR HELP! ASSIST (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: Полузарытый труп просит о помощи! Помочь (Y/N)?

text.originalText: THANKS! IT AIN'T EASY BEING A CORPSE! TAKE THESE...
text.localizedText: Спасибо! Нелегко быть трупом! Возьмите это...

text.originalText: THERE'S A SMALL SLOT IN THE DOOR.
text.localizedText: Вы видите маленькую щель в двери.

text.originalText: THE METALLIC ROOM IS DIMLY LIT BY A PULSATING WHITE GLOW!
text.localizedText: Металлическая комната слабо освещена пульсирующим белым светом!

text.originalText: IN A SERENE VOICE, THE DATA KEEPER SAYS,"WELCOME TO YOUR INNER SANCTUM VARNLINGS! I AM VERY PLEASED THAT YOU'VEMADE IT THIS FAR. YOU ARE TO BE COMMENDED. I'VE BEEN MONITORING YOUR PROGRESS." TURNING TO THE STRANGE MECHANICAL DEVICE, HE INSERTS A FLAT OBJECT INTO A SLOT. YOUR PARTY'S CURRENTPERFORMANCE TOTAL=
text.localizedText: Хранитель данных спокойно говорит: "Добро пожаловать в ваше внутреннее святилище жители VARN. То, что вы сделали, достойно похвалы. Я слежу за вашими подвигами." Он повернулся к странному механическому устройству и вставил плоский объект в щель. Ваш итоговый счет составляет

text.originalText: "YOU ARE NOT YET WORTHY FOR TRANSFER. RETURN AFTER DEFEATING THE IMPOSTER."
text.localizedText: "Вы еще не готовы к перемещению. Приходите, когда победите самозванца."

text.originalText: EXCELLENT RATING! THIS IS A RARE OCCASION, FOR ONLY A PRIVILEGED FEW ARE GIVEN THE OPPORTUNITY FOR TRANSFER TO ANOTHER V.A.R.N. (VEHICULAR ASTROPOD RESEARCH NACELLE). RETURN NOW TO THE INN OF SORPIGAL FOR REST AND CELEBRATIONTHEN CONTINUE ON TO YOUR NEW ASSIGNMENT AT THE GATES TO ANOTHER WORLD..." (+500,000 EXP FOR YOUR ACCOMPLISHMENT!) ----------------------------------------PLEASE SEND YOUR PERFORMANCE TOTAL TO NEW WORLD COMPUTING, INC. P. O. BOX 2068 VAN NUYS, CA 91404
text.localizedText: Великолепный счет! Вам выпала редкая удача. Немногие получают возможность перемещения на другой V.A.R.N. (исследовательская гондола Транспортируемого звездолета). Возвращайтесь в гостиницу Сорпигала, чтобы отдохнуть и отпраздновать, затем отправляйтесь к воротам в иной мир..." (+500,000 опыта за ваше достижение!) ----------------------------------------Пожалуйста, отправьте ваш итоговый результат в NEW WORLD COMPUTING, INC. P. O. BOX 2068 VAN NUYS, CA 91404

text.originalText: A METALLIC PANEL SLIDES OPEN, REVEALING A MYSTERIOUS MAN IN A WHITE COAT... (PRESS SPACE TO COMMUNICATE)
text.localizedText: Металлическая панель отъехала, открывая загадочного человека в белом халате... (Нажмите пробел)

text.originalText: CASTLE GUARDS EXCLAIM, "NO MERCHANTS PASS! BEGONE PEASANTS."
text.localizedText: Стражник кричит: "Где грамота купца? Прочь, крестьяне!"

text.originalText: FIND THE ANCIENT RUINS IN THE QUIVERING FOREST
text.localizedText: Найдите древние руины в Дрожащем лесу
Посетите пик радости и доложите об этом

text.originalText: THE PEOPLE OF THE DESERT HAVE MUCH TO TRADE,BRING ME A SAMPLE OF THEIR GOODS
text.localizedText: Люди пустыни торгуют разными вещами. Принесите мне образец их товаров

text.originalText: FIND THE SHRINE OF OKZAR IN THE CAVES BELOW DUSK
text.localizedText: Найдите склеп Окзара в пещерах под Даском

text.originalText: FIND THE FABLED FOUNTAIN IN DRAGADUNE
SOLVE THE RIDDLE OF THE RUBY
DEFEAT THE STRONGHOLD IN THE ENCHANTED FOREST
"RETURN NOT UNTIL THY QUEST IS COMPLETE"
"SORRY, BUT SINCE YOU ARE CURRENTLY QUESTED, I CAN'T ENGAGE YOUR SERVICES."
text.localizedText: "Простите, но я не найму вас, пока у васесть другое задание."

text.originalText: MAN IN SHACKLES MOANS IN AGONY!
ETCHED IN SILVER, MESSAGE A READS: ATIS-19-31UD54AEUPI1
text.localizedText: На серебряной табличке A гравировка: шхек,E1,D-дьк5;д1е/м1

text.originalText: MY BREW IS COMPLETE, GUARDS TAKE THEIR ITEMS AND SEND THEM TO THE PIT!
text.localizedText: Мое варево готово. Стража, заберите их вещи и бросьте их в яму!

text.originalText: "RETURN NOT UNTIL THY QUEST IS COMPLETE"(LEADER SHOULD PRESENT ITEMS)
text.localizedText: "Не возвращайтесь, пока не выполните задание" (предмет должен быть у лидера)

text.originalText: A MYSTERIOUS CLOAKED FIGURE, BOUND AND GAGGED, LIES MOTIONLESS IN THE CORNER.
text.localizedText: В углу, связанная и закутанная в плащ, неподвижно лежит загадочная личность.

text.originalText: ETCHED IN SILVER, MESSAGE C READS: IACI1;-2;0NU--G,NOT2
text.localizedText: На серебряной табличке C гравировка: еар:1-33-1зе,;ду;мПи2

text.originalText: AN ELDERLY MAN BEHIND A DESK SPEAKS: "I AM IN NEED OF COURIER SERVICE, ARE YOU INTERESTED (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: За столом сидит пожилой человек. "Мне нужно доставить кое-что. Вам это интересно (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: "I SEE YOU HAVEN'T DELIVERED MY MESSAGE, CARE TO TRY AGAIN (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: "Я вижу, вы не доставили мое послание. Хотите попробовать еще раз (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: "GOOD! TAKE THIS SCROLL TO THE WIZARD AGAR IN ERLIQUIN AND YOU SHALL BE REWARDED."
text.localizedText: "Хорошо! Доставьте этот свиток Агару волшебнику в Эрликин и получите награду."

text.originalText: AROUND THE ROOM THERE ARE SEVERAL BALCONIES FILLED WITH CHEERING PEASANTS A MAN ASKS "WILL YOU PARTICIPATE (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: По периметру комнаты расположены балконыс ликующей толпой. Человек спрашивает: "вы будете участвовать (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: A SIGN ABOVE THE DOOR READS:
A SHIMMERING BLUE AND WHITE PORTAL APPEARS! ENTER (Y/N)?
SCRAWLED ON THE WALL, A MESSAGE READS:
THE JAIL ABOVE HAS MANY CELLS.
SHIMMERING BLUE AND WHITE PORTAL, ENTER (Y/N)?
BUTTON ON THE WALL, PRESS IT (Y/N)?
A BANNER READS: CORRIDOR OF ENDLESS ENCOUNTERS!
text.localizedText: Надпись на стяге: Коридор вечных схваток!

text.originalText: A CRAZED WIZARD EXCLAIMS, "ENCOUNTER THE 13, WIN THE PRIZE!"
COVERED WITH FLASHING LIGHTS THE WALL SPEAKS: "PLEASE ENTER ACCESS CODE:"
text.localizedText: Стена покрыта мигающими огнями говорит: "Введите код доступа:"

text.originalText: DANCING LIGHTS FLICKER AND CRACKEL IN THE AREA IN FRONT OF YOU!
text.localizedText: Пляшущие огни мерцают и трещат перед вами!

text.originalText: THE PRISM OF PRECISION GRANTS THOSE WHO ARE WORTHY +4 ACCURACY!
text.localizedText: Призма точности тем, кто достоин, дарует+4 Меткости!

text.originalText: THE FLAME OF AGILITY GRANTS THOSE WHO ARE WORTHY +4 SPEED!
text.localizedText: Пламя ловкости тем, кто достоин, дарует +4 Скорости!

text.originalText: YOUR LEADER IS OF CLEAR MIND.
SCRAWLED IN STONE: CHARACTER #1 LEADS THE WAY. BEWARE, TRAPS ABOUND!
text.localizedText: На камне небрежно написано: Персонаж #1 ведет. Опасайтесь ловушек!

text.originalText: BEHIND AN OLD TAPESTRY, A MESSAGE ETCHED IN GOLD READS: YICU2ME3
text.localizedText: Позади старого гобелена золотая гравировка: YICU2ME3

text.originalText: A PASSAGE LEADS OUTSIDE, TAKE IT (Y/N)?
"I'M THE WIZARD RANALOU. ARE YOU HERE TOUSE THE PORTALS (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: "Я колдун Раналу. Вы хотите воспользоваться порталами (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: "GOOD! INSIDE THIS ROOM ARE 6 PORTALS, EACH OF WHICH LEADS TO A CASTLE. THE STATUE OF JUDGEMENT REQUIRES YOU TO FINDONE PRISONER FROM EACH OF THESE CASTLES BEFORE YOU MAY BE FOUND WORTHY."
text.localizedText: "Хорошо! В этой комнате есть 6 порталов,ведущих в замки. Чтобы Статуя правосудияпосчитала вас достойными, вам надо найтизаключенного в каждом из них."

text.originalText:
A SIGN:
EXPERIMENT IN PROGRESS, DO NOT ENTER!

A SIGN:
AUTHORIZED PERSONNEL ONLY! KEEP OUT.
A LADDER GOING UP, TAKE IT (Y/N)?
THE VOLCANO GOD BELLOWS, "WHAT DO YOU SEEK HERE?" A) A CHALLENGE B) A RIDDLE C) A CLUE
text.localizedText: Бог вулкан ревет: "Что вы ищете?" A) Поединок B) Загадку C) Подсказку

text.originalText:
WHO WAS BRAVE YET FAILED?
ANSWER:> ..........
text.localizedText:
Кто браво пытался, но проиграл?
Ответ :> ..........

text.originalText: PAINTED IN A BLACK AND WHITE PATTERN, A SIGN READS: THE SECOND PART IS THE MOST VALUABLE.
text.localizedText: Табличка в черно-белую клетку: Вторая часть наиболее важная.

text.originalText: A LUSCIOUS VIRGIN SHACKLED TO THE WALL! A) KISS HER B) RELEASE HER C) LEAVE
text.localizedText: Соблазнительная дева прикована к стене! A) поцеловать B) освободить C) Уйти

text.originalText: THIS CAVERN IS RANDOM UNTIL THE DIALS ARE SET.
text.localizedText: Эта пещера случайна, пока диски не выставлены.

text.originalText: ATOP A CRYSTAL PYRAMID SPINS A GLOWING POLYHEDRON. STOP IT ON SIDE (1-9)?
text.localizedText: На вершине пирамиды вращается мерцающий полиэндр. Остановить на стороне (1-9)?

text.originalText: THE POLYHEDRON IS SET ON SPIN IT (Y/N)?
A GLOWING POLYHEDRON IS SET ON SIDE
PLATINUM LEVER PROTRUDES FROM THE WALL.
YOU HAVE MASTERED THE MAGIC SQUARE! +2 INT, +20 GEMS, +200 GOLD, +2000 EXP
text.localizedText: Вы решили магический квадрат! +2 Инт, +20 камней, +200 зол, +2000 оп

text.originalText: A TRAP! A PIT FULL OF POISONOUS SPIKES OPENS BELOW THE PARTY!
text.localizedText: Ловушка! Яма с ядовитыми шипами Открылась под группой!

text.originalText: SMASHED REMAINS OF STONE STATUES SEEM SUSPICIOUSLY LIFELIKE.
text.localizedText: Разбитые остатки каменных статуй выглядят как живые.

text.originalText:
A STRANGE ALIEN BEING IN A SHIMMERING SILVER JUMPSUIT PROCLAIMS, "THIS IS A SOUL MAZE AND YOU ARE ITS PRISONER! TO ESCAPE, YOU MUST FIND YOUR CAPTOR'S NAME HIDDEN WITHIN THESE WALLS."
ANSWER:> ...............
text.localizedText:
Странный пришелец, одетый в мерцающий серебрянный комбинезон, объясняет: "это лабиринт душ и вы здесь пленники! Чтобы уйти, вам надо узнать имя пленителя, скрытое в этих стенах."
Ответ :> ...............

text.originalText: AGENT ORANGO SEVENTEEN REPORTING: IMPOSTER XX21A7-3 VOIDED! STARPHASE 5281.6 AT 120-VARN-161 POD #41YOU ARE NOW RANK 1 AND ELIGIBLE FOR TRANSFER. FIND INNER SANCTUM FOR NEW ASSIGNMENT. THE WALLS BEGIN TO FADE... (PRESS SPACE)
text.localizedText: Агент Оранго семнадцать докладывает: Самозванец XX21A7-3 устранен! Фаза 5281.6 борт 120-VARN-161 капсула#41Вам присвоен ранг 1 и выдано разрешение на перемещение. Обратитесь во внутреннеесвятилище За новым назначением. Стены начали пропадать... (нажмите пробел)

text.originalText: A GRUESOME STATUE SAYS: "START AT 15-7 AND WALK TO DOOM!"
text.localizedText: A GRUESOME STATUE SAYS: "START AT 15-7 AND WALK TO DOOM!"

text.originalText: A BANNER READS: THE ENDLESS SPIRAL!!!
text.localizedText: A BANNER READS: THE ENDLESS SPIRAL!!!

text.originalText: A SIGN ABOVE THE DOOR READS: MONSTER BREEDING GROUNDS, KEEP OUT!
text.localizedText: A SIGN ABOVE THE DOOR READS: MONSTER BREEDING GROUNDS, KEEP OUT!

text.originalText: SCRATCHED ON THE WALL: SEARCH AFTER THE CANINE REWARDS YOU!
text.localizedText: SCRATCHED ON THE WALL: SEARCH AFTER THE CANINE REWARDS YOU!

text.originalText: SCRAWLED ON THE WALL: FOR THE WORLD IS HOLLOW AND I HAVE TOUCHED THE SKY!
text.localizedText: SCRAWLED ON THE WALL: FOR THE WORLD IS HOLLOW AND I HAVE TOUCHED THE SKY!

text.originalText: A SMALL CHILD SHIVERS FEARFULLY AS YOU APPROACH.
text.localizedText: A SMALL CHILD SHIVERS FEARFULLY AS YOU APPROACH.

text.originalText: A PASSAGE LEADS OUTSIDE, TAKE IT (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: A PASSAGE LEADS OUTSIDE, TAKE IT (Y/N)?

text.originalText: ETCHED IN SILVER, MESSAGE D READS: //SV/21;-22R,;DU1RS0
text.localizedText: ETCHED IN SILVER, MESSAGE D READS: //SV/21;-22R,;DU1RS0

text.originalText: WRITTEN IN BLUE BLOOD: THE CANINE HAS THE KEY!
text.localizedText: WRITTEN IN BLUE BLOOD: THE CANINE HAS THE KEY!

text.originalText: SUSPENDED IN A FORCEFIELD IS THE BODY OF A MAN ENCLOSED IN AN IRON SUIT. TELEPATHIC COMMUNICATION:"I AM THE TRUE KING ALAMAR, IMPRISONED BY A DEMONIC ALIEN BEING! CONFRONT HIM WITH THIS EYE OF GOROS AND YOU SHALL SEE HIS TRUE SELF.
text.localizedText: SUSPENDED IN A FORCEFIELD IS THE BODY OF A MAN ENCLOSED IN AN IRON SUIT. TELEPATHIC COMMUNICATION:"I AM THE TRUE KING ALAMAR, IMPRISONED BY A DEMONIC ALIEN BEING! CONFRONT HIM WITH THIS EYE OF GOROS AND YOU SHALL SEE HIS TRUE SELF.

text.originalText: THE FATE OF THE REALM IS AT STAKE."
text.localizedText: THE FATE OF THE REALM IS AT STAKE."

text.originalText: WRITTEN ON THE WALL: JUMP THREE TIMES TO REACH CENTER.
text.localizedText: WRITTEN ON THE WALL: JUMP THREE TIMES TO REACH CENTER.

text.originalText: A MUTATED CREATURE CHAINED TO THE FLOOR GRUNTS AS YOU APPROACH.
text.localizedText: A MUTATED CREATURE CHAINED TO THE FLOOR GRUNTS AS YOU APPROACH.

text.originalText: A PASSAGE LEADS OUTSIDE, TAKE IT (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: A PASSAGE LEADS OUTSIDE, TAKE IT (Y/N)?

text.originalText: ETCHED IN SILVER, MESSAGE F READS: TSTST,E1,D-DS15A1DRH
text.localizedText: ETCHED IN SILVER, MESSAGE F READS: TSTST,E1,D-DS15A1DRH

text.originalText: THE GREEN CLOVER GRANTS THOSE WHO ARE WORTHY +4 LUCK!
text.localizedText: THE GREEN CLOVER GRANTS THOSE WHO ARE WORTHY +4 LUCK!

text.originalText: THE FABULOUS FABLED FOUNTAIN OF DRAGADUNE CONVERTS ALL GOLD INTO EXPERIENCE, ACCEPT (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: THE FABULOUS FABLED FOUNTAIN OF DRAGADUNE CONVERTS ALL GOLD INTO EXPERIENCE, ACCEPT (Y/N)?

text.originalText: CARVED IN STONE, A TRIVIAL MESSAGE READS: I BE ME
text.localizedText: CARVED IN STONE, A TRIVIAL MESSAGE READS: I BE ME

text.originalText: A SIGN ABOVE THE DOOR READS:
text.localizedText: A SIGN ABOVE THE DOOR READS:

text.originalText: A PASSAGE LEADS OUTSIDE, TAKE IT (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: A PASSAGE LEADS OUTSIDE, TAKE IT (Y/N)?

text.originalText: AN EERIE SILENCE PERVADES THE DESERTED INN. SUDDENLY, A GHOSTLY APPARITION APPEARS, ASKING, "SIGN IN (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: AN EERIE SILENCE PERVADES THE DESERTED INN. SUDDENLY, A GHOSTLY APPARITION APPEARS, ASKING, "SIGN IN (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: A YOUNG GNOME MATERIALIZES, ASKING, "WOULD YOU BE WANTING MY SERVICES(Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: A YOUNG GNOME MATERIALIZES, ASKING, "WOULD YOU BE WANTING MY SERVICES(Y/N)?"

text.originalText: A FAINT OUTLINE OF A MAN APPEARS, SAYING, "NEED SOME FEED (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: A FAINT OUTLINE OF A MAN APPEARS, SAYING, "NEED SOME FEED (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: BRIGHT LIGHTS SWIRL THROUGHOUT THE ROOM.A HORRIFYING VOICE SHRIEKS, "NEED HELP (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: BRIGHT LIGHTS SWIRL THROUGHOUT THE ROOM.A HORRIFYING VOICE SHRIEKS, "NEED HELP (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: SEVERAL EMPTY SUITS OF ARMOR APPROACH ASKING, "NEED TRAINING (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: SEVERAL EMPTY SUITS OF ARMOR APPROACH ASKING, "NEED TRAINING (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: AN ELF DRESSED IN ROBES APPROACHES...
text.localizedText: AN ELF DRESSED IN ROBES APPROACHES...

text.originalText: "FRIENDS, I AM TELGORAN. THIS SCROLL YOUHAVE BROUGHT ME WILL BE VERY HELPFUL (+2500 EXP) HERE'S 1500 GOLD FOR YOUR SERVICES. I'LL TELL YOU A SECRET, IF TREASURE IS WHAT YOU WANT..."
text.localizedText: "FRIENDS, I AM TELGORAN. THIS SCROLL YOUHAVE BROUGHT ME WILL BE VERY HELPFUL (+2500 EXP) HERE'S 1500 GOLD FOR YOUR SERVICES. I'LL TELL YOU A SECRET, IF TREASURE IS WHAT YOU WANT..."

text.originalText: "THE BROTHERS YOU MUST FIND... PORTSMITH AND ALGARY ARE COMBINED."
text.localizedText: "THE BROTHERS YOU MUST FIND... PORTSMITH AND ALGARY ARE COMBINED."

text.originalText: ETCHED IN GOLD, MESSAGE 3 READS: FOR-TASKS-AND-RATING.-BE-FROM-6TH- FRUSTRATIONS!-THE-TO-IN
text.localizedText: ETCHED IN GOLD, MESSAGE 3 READS: FOR-TASKS-AND-RATING.-BE-FROM-6TH- FRUSTRATIONS!-THE-TO-IN

text.originalText: THE COUNCIL OF STRENGTH IS IN SESSION
text.localizedText: THE COUNCIL OF STRENGTH IS IN SESSION

text.originalText: A SIGN ON THE DOOR READS:
text.localizedText: A SIGN ON THE DOOR READS:

text.originalText: THE ROOM IS PAINTED FROM CEILING TO FLOOR IN A BLACK AND WHITE CHECKERED PATTERN!
text.localizedText: THE ROOM IS PAINTED FROM CEILING TO FLOOR IN A BLACK AND WHITE CHECKERED PATTERN!

text.originalText: A TAPESTRY ON THE WALL DEPICTS A GRAY MINOTAUR STOMPING ON A GROUP OF KNIGHTS.
text.localizedText: A TAPESTRY ON THE WALL DEPICTS A GRAY MINOTAUR STOMPING ON A GROUP OF KNIGHTS.

text.originalText: A TAPESTRY ON THE WALL DEPICTS A KINGDOM RULED BY MINOTAURS.
text.localizedText: A TAPESTRY ON THE WALL DEPICTS A KINGDOM RULED BY MINOTAURS.

text.originalText: ETCHED IN GOLD, MESSAGE 9 READS: SUCCESSFUL-THAT-TRAINING,-THE-WORTHY- THE-VISIT-YET-INNER-REALITY,-ORDER,
text.localizedText: ETCHED IN GOLD, MESSAGE 9 READS: SUCCESSFUL-THAT-TRAINING,-THE-WORTHY- THE-VISIT-YET-INNER-REALITY,-ORDER,

text.originalText: THE MASTER OF THIS STRONGHOLD HAS BEEN DEFEATED!
text.localizedText: THE MASTER OF THIS STRONGHOLD HAS BEEN DEFEATED!

text.originalText: ENTER THE MAZE OF THE MINOTAUR... IF YOU DARE!
text.localizedText: ENTER THE MAZE OF THE MINOTAUR... IF YOU DARE!

text.originalText: STANDING ATOP A PEDESTAL IN THE CENTER OF THE ROOM IS A STATUE OF A SMALL SABLEAND WHITE DOG.
text.localizedText: STANDING ATOP A PEDESTAL IN THE CENTER OF THE ROOM IS A STATUE OF A SMALL SABLEAND WHITE DOG.

text.originalText: IT COMES TO LIFE AND SPEAKS,"CONGRATULATIONS, YOU'VE COMPLETED A MAJOR QUEST (+10000 EXP) REMEMBER B.J.!"
text.localizedText: IT COMES TO LIFE AND SPEAKS,"CONGRATULATIONS, YOU'VE COMPLETED A MAJOR QUEST (+10000 EXP) REMEMBER B.J.!"

text.originalText: A SIGN ABOVE THE DOOR READS:
text.localizedText: A SIGN ABOVE THE DOOR READS:

text.originalText: ADJUSTING HIS SPECTACLES, AN ELDERLY GNOME EYES THE PARTY AND ASKS, "SIGNING IN (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: ADJUSTING HIS SPECTACLES, AN ELDERLY GNOME EYES THE PARTY AND ASKS, "SIGNING IN (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: A BOISTROUS HALF-ORC PROCLAIMS, "WE CARRY THE VERY LATEST, BROWSE (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: A BOISTROUS HALF-ORC PROCLAIMS, "WE CARRY THE VERY LATEST, BROWSE (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: THE CHEF SAYS,"I ONLY SERVE THE BEST! HUNGRY (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: THE CHEF SAYS,"I ONLY SERVE THE BEST! HUNGRY (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: SEVERAL FAT CLERICS WELCOME YOU. NEED HELP (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: SEVERAL FAT CLERICS WELCOME YOU. NEED HELP (Y/N)?

text.originalText: THREE HUGE ARMOR CLAD KNIGHTS BARK IN UNISON, "WANT A GOOD WORKOUT (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: THREE HUGE ARMOR CLAD KNIGHTS BARK IN UNISON, "WANT A GOOD WORKOUT (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: "I HAVE NO BUSINESS WITH YOU. BEGONE!"
text.localizedText: "I HAVE NO BUSINESS WITH YOU. BEGONE!"

text.originalText: "YOU HAVE DONE WELL TO BRING ME THIS SCROLL. (+1000 EXP) NOW TAKE IT TO MY PROTEGE TELGORAN IN DUSK."
text.localizedText: "YOU HAVE DONE WELL TO BRING ME THIS SCROLL. (+1000 EXP) NOW TAKE IT TO MY PROTEGE TELGORAN IN DUSK."

text.originalText:
TOWN GUARDS: YOU'RE UNDER ARREST!
A)ATTACK B)BRIBE C)RUN D)SURRENDER
text.localizedText:
TOWN GUARDS: YOU'RE UNDER ARREST!
A)ATTACK B)BRIBE C)RUN D)SURRENDER

text.originalText: HAVE A DRINK, THEN WE'LL TALK.
THANKS A LOT, HAVE ANOTHER ROUND!
YOU LOOK TERRIBLE, GO SEE THE CLERICS.
text.localizedText: Ты плохо выглядишь, сходи к клерикам.

text.originalText:
SERVICES RENDERED, SECRETS UNFOLD THE BROTHERS TOGETHER LEAD TO TREASURES UNTOLD
FIVE TOWNS YOU MUST TRAVEL FOR THIS QUEST TO UNRAVEL
text.localizedText:
Окажешь услугу, раскроешь суть Братья совместно к сокровищу укажут путь
В пяти городах побывай, Эту тайну рагадай

text.originalText: SEEK THE WIZARD RANALOU IN HIS LAIR AT THE KORIN BLUFFS SIX CASTLES HE WILL SEND YOU TO BUT DOOM WILL BE QUITE TOUGH! CRUELTY AND KINDNESS MEASURED THROUGHOUT JUDGEMENT DAY IS THEN SOUGHT OUT
text.localizedText: Ищи колдуна Раналу в его убежище на утесе газели Отправит он тебя в шесть замков Но рок будет очень сложным! Добро и зло, проявленные тобой, зачтутся в Судный день

text.originalText: ONE BY WATER, ONE BY LAND ONE BY AIR, AND ONE BY SAND THE WHEEL OF LUCK WILL FAVORABLY PAY, THE MORE OF THESE MENACING BEASTS YOU SLAY! ALTHOUGH WISHES MAY COME TRUE ALL THE BEASTS WILL BECOME ANEW
text.localizedText: Одно на земле, одно в воде Одно в воздухе, одно на песке Чем больше чудищ истреблено, тем более благосклонно Колесо Удачи! Желания сбываются Чудища возрождаются

text.originalText: THERE ARE MANY DUNGEONS LIKE ME FIND THE RIGHT PAIR AND YOU'LL DISCOVER THE KEY THE ANCIENT SEER OG HAS LOST HIS SIGHT THE IDOLS WILL HELP TO END HIS PLIGHT
text.localizedText: Есть много таких же темниц Найди правильную пару и ты получишь ключ Древний провидец Ог потерял свое зрение Идолы помогут снять обет

text.originalText:
IN HONOR OF CORAK...
FOR HIS MAPPING EXPEDITION OF THE LAND OF VARN AND REDISCOVERY OF THE LOST TOWN OF DUSK
text.localizedText:
Во славу Корака...
За его картографическую экспедицию по земле VARN и открытие давно потерянного города Даск

text.originalText:
IN HONOR OF GALA...
FOR HER BRAVE ATTEMPT TO WORK WITH THE SAVAGES OF THE VOLCANIC ISLES
text.localizedText:
Во славу Галы...
За ее бравую попытку работы с дикарями вулканических островов

text.originalText:
IN MEMORY OF A TIME LONG AGO...
BEFORE THE DAYS WHEN THE TOWNS MOVED UNDERGROUND, DRAGONS WERE FEW AND FAR BETWEEN
text.localizedText:
В память о давних временах...
До ухода городов под землю редко можно было встретить дракона

text.originalText: THIS BEAST ONCE ROAMED THE ENCHANTED FOREST AND NOW RULES A GREAT FORTRESS THERE
text.localizedText: Этот зверь сейчас управляет крепостью в зачарованом лесу

text.originalText: A DWARF PALADIN PAINTED A BLACK & WHITE CHECKERED MOTIF

text.localizedText: *** Ныне же будете вы под защитой!

text.originalText: YOU SURPRISED A GROUP OF MONSTERS,
DARTS!! A SWARM OF POISONOUS DARTS FILL THE AIR!
text.localizedText: DARTS!! A SWARM OF POISONOUS DARTS FILL THE AIR!

text.originalText: # NAME HIT PTS SPELL PTS AC
LARA, THE INKEEPERS VOLUPTUOUS DAUGHTER, ASKS IF YOU WILL BE SPENDING THE NIGHT... SIGN IN (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: LARA, THE INKEEPERS VOLUPTUOUS DAUGHTER, ASKS IF YOU WILL BE SPENDING THE NIGHT... SIGN IN (Y/N)?

text.originalText: A SIGN ABOVE THE DOOR READS:
text.localizedText: A SIGN ABOVE THE DOOR READS:

text.originalText: BUSILY FORGING A LONG SWORD,AN EXTREMELYBEAUTIFUL YOUNG GIRL SAYS WITH A SEDUCTIVE SMILE, "CAN I HELP YOU (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: BUSILY FORGING A LONG SWORD,AN EXTREMELYBEAUTIFUL YOUNG GIRL SAYS WITH A SEDUCTIVE SMILE, "CAN I HELP YOU (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: FROM BEHIND THE FRUIT STAND A SULTRY VOICE ASKS, "SEE ANYTHING YOU LIKE (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: FROM BEHIND THE FRUIT STAND A SULTRY VOICE ASKS, "SEE ANYTHING YOU LIKE (Y/N)?"

text.localizedText: THE ONCE MAGNIFICENT TEMPLE SHOWS SIGNS OF NEGLECT AND DECAY. THE HIGH PRIESTESS ASKS,"NEED HELP (Y/N)?"

text.localizedText: A TALL, MUSCULAR FEMALE CLAD IN LEATHER ARMOR APPROACHES ASKING, "STRANGERS, ARE YOU HERE FOR TRAINING (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: "I AM ZAM, ASTRAL BROTHER OF ZOM AND ONLY LIVING MALE RESIDING IN PORTSMITH
text.localizedText: "I AM ZAM, ASTRAL BROTHER OF ZOM AND ONLY LIVING MALE RESIDING IN PORTSMITH

text.localizedText: A SENSUOUS FEMALE VOICE SPEAKS FROM WITHIN AN INTOXICATING MIST, "YOU'VE DISCOVERED MY SECRET!"

text.localizedText: ETCHED IN GOLD, MESSAGE 7 READS: THESE-AND-THAT-MUST-CAN-DIFFERENT- SHALL-HAVE-FROM-A-JVC

text.localizedText: CLUB DEAD... THE ANTIDOTE TO HUMANIZATION!

text.localizedText: A PASSAGE LEADS OUTSIDE, TAKE IT (Y/N)?

text.localizedText: THE ROOM IS PAINTED FROM CEILING TO FLOOR IN A BLACK AND WHITE CHECKERED PATTERN!

text.localizedText: THE WALL IS PAINTED FROM CEILING TO FLOOR IN A BLACK AND WHITE CHECKERED PATTERN!

text.localizedText: ETCHED IN GOLD, MESSAGE 1 READS: COMPLETION-MUST-EACH-KINGS-OF-ASTRAL- WITH-9TH-SANCTUM-AND-WONDROUS

text.originalText: A GHOSTLIKE FIGURE RISES FROM THE BODY OF OKRIM AND SPEAKS,"IN EXCHANGE FOR MY RING, FORFEIT A LIFE, ACCEPT (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: A GHOSTLIKE FIGURE RISES FROM THE BODY OF OKRIM AND SPEAKS,"IN EXCHANGE FOR MY RING, FORFEIT A LIFE, ACCEPT (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: "MAY THE SHADOW OF DEATH GREET YOU WITH OPEN ARMS!"
text.localizedText: "MAY THE SHADOW OF DEATH GREET YOU WITH OPEN ARMS!"

text.localizedText: A GEM ENCRUSTED ARCHWAY READS: LAIR OF THE OMNIPOTENT WIZARD OKRIM

text.originalText: AN OPENING ABOVE LEADS OUTSIDE, CLIMB OUT (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: AN OPENING ABOVE LEADS OUTSIDE, CLIMB OUT (Y/N)?

text.originalText: THE WALL IS PAINTED FROM CEILING TO FLOOR IN A BLACK AND WHITE CHECKERED PATTERN!
text.localizedText: THE WALL IS PAINTED FROM CEILING TO FLOOR IN A BLACK AND WHITE CHECKERED PATTERN!

text.originalText: ETCHED IN GOLD, MESSAGE 4 READS: OF-BE-HAS-TRUE-KNOWLEDGE-PLANE-A-LEVEL- TO-REALITY-IT
text.localizedText: ETCHED IN GOLD, MESSAGE 4 READS: OF-BE-HAS-TRUE-KNOWLEDGE-PLANE-A-LEVEL- TO-REALITY-IT

text.originalText: A BANNER READS: THE LABYRINTH OF LAZZERUTH... FEW HAVE ENTERED, NONE HAVE RETURNED!
text.localizedText: A BANNER READS: THE LABYRINTH OF LAZZERUTH... FEW HAVE ENTERED, NONE HAVE RETURNED!

text.originalText: INSET IN THE WALL, A STONE FACE YELLS: "MY BRAIN HURTS!"
text.localizedText: INSET IN THE WALL, A STONE FACE YELLS: "MY BRAIN HURTS!"

text.originalText: INSET IN THE WALL, A STONE FACE SPEAKS: "I WOULD PAY HIGHLY FOR A GREEN HANDLED, PEARL ENCRUSTED ABELNUSKI."
text.localizedText: INSET IN THE WALL, A STONE FACE SPEAKS: "I WOULD PAY HIGHLY FOR A GREEN HANDLED, PEARL ENCRUSTED ABELNUSKI."

text.originalText: INSET IN THE WALL, A STONE FACE SPEAKS: "I SEE ALL, HEAR ALL, KNOW NOTHING..."
text.localizedText: INSET IN THE WALL, A STONE FACE SPEAKS: "I SEE ALL, HEAR ALL, KNOW NOTHING..."

text.originalText: INSET IN THE WALL, A STONE FACE PROCLAIMS: "OKRIM IS WATCHING. HE STUDIES YOUR WEAKNESSES!"
text.localizedText: INSET IN THE WALL, A STONE FACE PROCLAIMS: "OKRIM IS WATCHING. HE STUDIES YOUR WEAKNESSES!"

text.originalText: THE WALL IS PAINTED FROM CEILING TO FLOOR IN A BLACK AND WHITE CHECKERED PATTERN!
text.localizedText: THE WALL IS PAINTED FROM CEILING TO FLOOR IN A BLACK AND WHITE CHECKERED PATTERN!

text.originalText: A STRANGE RINGING SOUND STARTLES THE PARTY. YOU ARE TELEPORTED!
text.localizedText: A STRANGE RINGING SOUND STARTLES THE PARTY. YOU ARE TELEPORTED!

text.originalText: ETCHED IN GOLD, MESSAGE 6 READS: BOOK-DONE.-A-SELF-THAT-FROM-KEY-YOU- BE-TO-SEEMS
text.localizedText: ETCHED IN GOLD, MESSAGE 6 READS: BOOK-DONE.-A-SELF-THAT-FROM-KEY-YOU- BE-TO-SEEMS

text.originalText: IN THE CENTER OF THE ROOM, A HUGE RUBY STANDS ATOP A PEDESTAL. HEXAGONALLY SHAPED, IT GLOWS RHYTHMICALLY! MESMERIZED BY ITS LIGHT, YOU HEAR: GLASS THAT GLITTERS, RUBIES THAT GLOW WHEN I TWINKLE, I CAST A RAINBOW WHAT AM I? :> ...............
text.localizedText: IN THE CENTER OF THE ROOM, A HUGE RUBY STANDS ATOP A PEDESTAL. HEXAGONALLY SHAPED, IT GLOWS RHYTHMICALLY! MESMERIZED BY ITS LIGHT, YOU HEAR: GLASS THAT GLITTERS, RUBIES THAT GLOW WHEN I TWINKLE, I CAST A RAINBOW WHAT AM I? :> ...............

text.originalText: A SILVER DOOR, YOUR SILVER KEY GLOWS!
text.localizedText: A SILVER DOOR, YOUR SILVER KEY GLOWS!

text.originalText: THE ROOM IS PAINTED IN A BLACK AND WHITE CHECKERED PATTERN!
text.localizedText: THE ROOM IS PAINTED IN A BLACK AND WHITE CHECKERED PATTERN!

text.originalText: ETCHED IN GOLD, MESSAGE 2 READS: ONE,-RIDDLES-VALUE-YOU-YOU-5-CARD-MUST- CLAIMED.-DREAMS,-...
text.localizedText: ETCHED IN GOLD, MESSAGE 2 READS: ONE,-RIDDLES-VALUE-YOU-YOU-5-CARD-MUST- CLAIMED.-DREAMS,-...

text.originalText: "I AM LORD ARCHER, THE RAVEN, I TAKE FROM THOSE WHO HAVE AND GIVE TO THOSE WHO HAVE NOT! SUBMIT (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: "I AM LORD ARCHER, THE RAVEN, I TAKE FROM THOSE WHO HAVE AND GIVE TO THOSE WHO HAVE NOT! SUBMIT (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: A BUTTON ON THE WALL, PUSH IT (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: A BUTTON ON THE WALL, PUSH IT (Y/N)?

text.originalText: SQUISH! THE PARTY IS IMPALED ON A WALL OF SPEARS!
text.localizedText: SQUISH! THE PARTY IS IMPALED ON A WALL OF SPEARS!

text.originalText: A BOULDER SAYS:"THERE SHOULD BE 5 TESTS"
text.localizedText: A BOULDER SAYS:"THERE SHOULD BE 5 TESTS"

text.originalText: THE INNKEEPER ASKS: "WOULD YOU LIKE TO SIGN IN (Y/N)?"
A SIGN ABOVE THE DOOR READS:
A MAN WEARING A LEATHER APRON SPEAKS: "DISTINGUISHED TRAVELERS, YOU'VE COME TOTHE RIGHT PLACE.CAN I HELP YOU (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: Мужчина в кожаном фартуке говорит: "Дорогие путешественники, хорошо, что выпришли. Могу я вам помочь (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: BEHIND THE COUNTER, AN OVERWEIGHT DWARF EXCLAIMS: "YOU LOOK LIKE A HUNGRY BUNCH!WOULD YOU LIKE TO BUY SOME FOOD (Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: За стойкой вы видите толстого дварфа Он восклицает: "Вы выглядите голодными! Хотите купить еды (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: SEVERAL ORNATELY ROBED CLERICS APPROACH THE PARTY AND ASK, "DO YOU SEEK OUR HELP(Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: К вам подошли несколько клериков в красивых робах. Они спрашивают "Мы можемвам помочь (Y/N)?"

text.originalText: BEFORE YOU ARE VARIOUS GROUPS ENGAGED INTRAINING EXERCISES. WORG,THE GUILDMASTERASKS, "DO YOU REQUIRE TRAINING(Y/N)?"
text.localizedText: Вы видите несколько групп, делающих упражнения. Ворг, тренер, спрашивает: "Хотите потренироваться (Y/N)?"

text.originalText:
A TENACIOUS LEPRECHAUN APPEARS SAYING, "TRAVELING THE ROADS IS QUITE DANGEROUS SAVE FOR THE STRONG AND COURAGEOUS, ONLY 1 GEM YOU LOSE AND I'LL SEND YOU TO THE TOWN YOU CHOOSE."
'ESC' TO GO BACK WHICH TOWN (1-5)?
text.localizedText:
К вам пристает назойливый лепрекон: "Путешествия по дорогам опасны и больше подходят для сильных и храбрых. За 1 драгоценный камень я переправлю вас в любой город."
'ESC' отказаться Выберите город (1-5)
Ступени уходят в темноту! Рискнем спуститься (Y/N)?

text.originalText: THERE IS A STATUE HERE, SEARCH IT (Y/N)?
A PASSAGE LEADS OUTSIDE, TAKE IT (Y/N)?
ETCHED IN GOLD, MESSAGE 8 READS: THE-ARE-QUESTS,-INCREASES-IDENTIFY,- APPLY.-LOCATIONS,-END-ATTAINED-MY-SEQUEL
text.localizedText: ETCHED IN GOLD, MESSAGE 8 READS: THE-ARE-QUESTS,-INCREASES-IDENTIFY,- APPLY.-LOCATIONS,-END-ATTAINED-MY-SEQUEL

text.originalText: PAINTED IN A BLACK AND WHITE PATTERN, A SIGN READS: THE LAST PART IS THE FIRST
text.localizedText: PAINTED IN A BLACK AND WHITE PATTERN, A SIGN READS: THE LAST PART IS THE FIRST

text.originalText: ETCHED IN STONE: "28 DAYS OUT. NO FOOD, LOW ON SUPPLIES. WE FEAR THE WORST YET WE CONTINUE-CORAK
text.localizedText: ETCHED IN STONE: "28 DAYS OUT. NO FOOD, LOW ON SUPPLIES. WE FEAR THE WORST YET WE CONTINUE-CORAK

text.originalText: A SIGN ON THE DOOR READS:
text.localizedText: A SIGN ON THE DOOR READS:

text.originalText: THE WALL IS PAINTED FROM CEILING TO FLOOR IN A BLACK AND WHITE CHECKERED PATTERN!
text.localizedText: THE WALL IS PAINTED FROM CEILING TO FLOOR IN A BLACK AND WHITE CHECKERED PATTERN!

text.originalText: THE ROOM IS PAINTED FROM CEILING TO FLOOR IN A BLACK AND WHITE CHECKERED PATTERN!
text.localizedText: THE ROOM IS PAINTED FROM CEILING TO FLOOR IN A BLACK AND WHITE CHECKERED PATTERN!

text.originalText: CLERICS OF THE SOUTH JUST BELOW-CORAK
text.localizedText: CLERICS OF THE SOUTH JUST BELOW-CORAK

text.originalText: ETCHED IN GOLD, MESSAGE 5 READS: SCOOP:-THE-DISCOVERIES-YOUR-TO-RETURN- THE-YOUR-FOR-DREAMS-IS
text.localizedText: ETCHED IN GOLD, MESSAGE 5 READS: SCOOP:-THE-DISCOVERIES-YOUR-TO-RETURN- THE-YOUR-FOR-DREAMS-IS

text.originalText: COVERED WITH CRYPTIC SYMBOLS, A LARGE BRASS GONG HANGS FROM THE CEILING. STRIKE IT (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: COVERED WITH CRYPTIC SYMBOLS, A LARGE BRASS GONG HANGS FROM THE CEILING. STRIKE IT (Y/N)?

text.originalText: A LOUD TONE RESOUNDS THROUGHOUT THE ROOM!
text.localizedText: A LOUD TONE RESOUNDS THROUGHOUT THE ROOM!

text.originalText: A SHARP TONE ASSAULTS YOUR SENSES!
text.localizedText: A SHARP TONE ASSAULTS YOUR SENSES!

text.originalText: THE CLERICS OF THE SOUTH SPEAK: "
text.localizedText: THE CLERICS OF THE SOUTH SPEAK: "

text.originalText: WE DEEM YOU WORTHY OF ADVANCEMENT!"
text.localizedText: WE DEEM YOU WORTHY OF ADVANCEMENT!"

text.originalText: ON THE RIGHT WALL IS A PAINTING OF A BOX,ON THE LEFT A PAINTING OF A CURTAIN.
text.localizedText: ON THE RIGHT WALL IS A PAINTING OF A BOX,ON THE LEFT A PAINTING OF A CURTAIN.

text.originalText: BUTTON ON THE WALL, PUSH IT (Y/N)?
text.localizedText: BUTTON ON THE WALL, PUSH IT (Y/N)?

text.originalText: FIND THE STRONGHOLD IN RAVENS WOOD
text.localizedText: FIND THE STRONGHOLD IN RAVENS WOOD

text.originalText: FIND THE SHIPWRECK OF THE JOLLY RAVEN
text.localizedText: FIND THE SHIPWRECK OF THE JOLLY RAVEN

text.originalText: DEFEAT THE PIRATE GHOST SHIP ANARCHIST
text.localizedText: DEFEAT THE PIRATE GHOST SHIP ANARCHIST

text.originalText: DEFEAT THE STRONGHOLD IN RAVENS WOOD
text.localizedText: DEFEAT THE STRONGHOLD IN RAVENS WOOD

text.originalText: "RETURN NOT UNTIL THY QUEST IS COMPLETE"
text.localizedText: "RETURN NOT UNTIL THY QUEST IS COMPLETE"

text.originalText: "SORRY, BUT SINCE YOU ARE CURRENTLY QUESTED, I CAN'T ENGAGE YOUR SERVICES."
text.localizedText: "SORRY, BUT SINCE YOU ARE CURRENTLY QUESTED, I CAN'T ENGAGE YOUR SERVICES."

text.originalText: A VICIOUS DEMON LUNGES AT THE PARTY, RESTRAINED ONLY BY A COLLAR AND CHAIN!
text.localizedText: A VICIOUS DEMON LUNGES AT THE PARTY, RESTRAINED ONLY BY A COLLAR AND CHAIN!

text.originalText: ETCHED IN SILVER, MESSAGE B READS: RSTIA-,E1,;/11RN;/M-
text.localizedText: ETCHED IN SILVER, MESSAGE B READS: RSTIA-,E1,;/11RN;/M-

text.originalText: CASTLE GUARDS EXCLAIM, "NO MERCHANTS PASS! BEGONE PEASANTS."
text.localizedText: CASTLE GUARDS EXCLAIM, "NO MERCHANTS PASS! BEGONE PEASANTS."
